mapper.select: SELECT A.USER_NO, B.USER_NM FROM tb_tch_tch_info A LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_usr_user_info B ON ( A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO ) WHERE A.TCH_CTGR_CD = 'T01'

SELECT 2000+replace(SUBSTR(STR_TO_DATE(#{startDay},'%Y%m%d') + LEVEL -1 , 0,3),'/','')year , replace(SUBSTR(STR_TO_DATE(#{startDay},'%Y%m%d') + LEVEL -1 , 3,4),'/','')month, replace(SUBSTR(STR_TO_DATE(#{startDay},'%Y%m%d') + LEVEL -1 , 6,6),'/','')day, ((STR_TO_DATE(#{startDay},'%Y%m%d') + LEVEL -1) +7)-next_day((STR_TO_DATE(#{startDay},'%Y%m%d') + LEVEL -1),1)+1 dday FROM DUAL WHERE ((STR_TO_DATE(#{startDay},'%Y%m%d') + LEVEL -1) +7)-next_day((STR_TO_DATE(#{startDay},'%Y%m%d') + LEVEL -1),1)+1 in ( #{dDay} + " ) CONNECT BY (STR_TO_DATE(#{startDay}) + LEVEL -1) <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endDay})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_tch_insd_tch_sch ( USER_NO , SCH_SN , SCH_DIV_CD , LEC_DIV_CD , OTSD_LEC_GOING_DTTM , OTSD_LEC_RETURN_DTTM , REQ_ORG_NM , PLACE , TRAINING_CRS , EDU_TARGET , LEC_TITLE , EDU_NOP_CNT , OFFICIAL_DOC_RECV_YN , OTSD_LEC_REPT_RELEV_YN , OTSD_LEC_REPT_DATA_SEND_YN , APPROVAL_YN , EXTRN_LEC_RSLT_REPT_SEND_YN , SCH_DESC , REG_NO , REG_DTTM , MOD_NO , MOD_DTTM ) VALUES( #{userNo} , #{schSn} , #{schDivCd} , #{lecDivCd} , #{otsdLecGoingDttm} , #{otsdLecReturnDttm} , #{reqOrgNm} , #{place} , #{trainingCrs} , #{eduTarget} , #{lecTitle} , #{eduNopCnt} , #{officialDocRecvYn} , #{otsdLecReptRelevYn} , #{otsdLecReptDataSendYn} , #{approvalYn} , #{extrnLecRsltReptSendYn} , #{schDesc} , #{regNo} , DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), #{modNo} , DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'))

INSERT INTO tb_tch_insd_tch_sch_detl ( USER_NO, SCH_SN, SCH_DETL_SN, YEAR, MONTH, DAY, START_TM, END_TM ) VALUES( #{userNo} , #{schSn} , #{schDetlSn} , #{year} , #{month} , #{day} , #{startTm} , #{endTm} )

INSERT INTO tb_tch_insd_tch_sch_detl ( USER_NO, SCH_SN, SCH_DETL_SN, YEAR, MONTH, DAY, START_TM, END_TM ) SELECT nextval('SQ_TB_TCH_INSD_TCH_SCH_DETL_SN') AS SCH_DETL_SN, A.* FROM(
SELECT #{item.userNo} AS userNo , #{item.schSn} AS schSn, #{item.schDetlSn} AS schDetlSn, #{item.year} AS year, #{item.month} AS month, #{item.day} AS day, #{item.startTm} AS startTm, #{item.endTm} AS endTm FROM DUAL )A
mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT((CASE WHEN SCHM.SCH_DIV_CD = 'I' THEN '내부' ELSE '외부' END),'-',INFO.USER_NM) AS TITLE, STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(SCHD.YEAR,SCHD.MONTH,SCHD.DAY),'%Y%m%d') as START_DATE, STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(SCHD.YEAR,SCHD.MONTH,SCHD.DAY),'%Y%m%d') AS END_DATE, CONCAT(SCHM.SCH_SN,'-',SCHD.SCH_DETL_SN) AS SCH_ID , SCHD.YEAR, SCHD.MONTH, SCHD.DAY, SUBSTR(SCHD.START_TM,1,2) AS START_HH_TIME, SUBSTR(SCHD.START_TM,3,4) AS START_MM_TIME, SUBSTR(SCHD.END_TM,1,2) AS END_HH_TIME, SUBSTR(SCHD.END_TM,3,4) AS END_MM_TIME, SCHD.START_TM,SCHD.END_TM, SCHM.SCH_SN,SCHD.SCH_DETL_SN, INFO.EMAIL FROM tb_tch_insd_tch_sch SCHM, tb_tch_insd_tch_sch_detl SCHD, tb_usr_user_info INFO, tb_usr_login LOGI WHERE SCHM.USER_NO = SCHD.USER_NO AND SCHM.USER_NO = INFO.USER_NO AND SCHM.USER_NO = LOGI.USER_NO AND SCHM.SCH_SN = SCHD.SCH_SN AND SCHD.YEAR = #{searchYear} AND SCHD.MONTH =#{searchMonth} AND INFO.USER_NM like CONCAT('%',(CASE WHEN #{searchName} = '' THEN '%' ELSE #{searchName} END)) AND SCHM.SCH_DIV_CD like CONCAT('%',(CASE WHEN #{searchIo} = '' THEN '%' ELSE #{searchIo} END))

SELECT SCHM.USER_NO, SCHM.SCH_SN, CONCAT(DECODE(CASE WHEN SCHM.SCH_DIV_CD ='I' THEN '내부' ELSE '외부' END),'-',FN_GET_CODE_NAME('LEC_DIV_CD',SCHM.LEC_DIV_CD)) AS LEC_DIV_CD, FN_GET_CODE_NAME('SCH_PURP_DIV_CD',SCHM.SCH_PURP_DIV_CD) AS SCH_PURP_DIV_CD, SCHM.OTSD_LEC_GOING_DTTM, SCHM.OTSD_LEC_RETURN_DTTM, SCHM.REQ_ORG_NM, SCHM.PLACE, SCHM.TRAINING_CRS, SCHM.EDU_TARGET, SCHM.LEC_TITLE, SCHM.EDU_NOP_CNT, SCHM.ORG_CHRG_PRSN_PHONENO, FN_GET_CODE_NAME('OFFICIAL_DOC_RECV_YN',SCHM.OFFICIAL_DOC_RECV_YN) AS OFFICIAL_DOC_RECV_YN, FN_GET_CODE_NAME('LEC_REPT_RELEV_YN',SCHM.OTSD_LEC_REPT_RELEV_YN) AS OTSD_LEC_REPT_RELEV_YN, FN_GET_CODE_NAME('DATA_SEND_YN',SCHM.OTSD_LEC_REPT_DATA_SEND_YN) AS OTSD_LEC_REPT_DATA_SEND_YN, FN_GET_CODE_NAME('APPROVAL_YN',SCHM.APPROVAL_YN) AS APPROVAL_YN, FN_GET_CODE_NAME('DATA_SEND_YN',SCHM.EXTRN_LEC_RSLT_REPT_SEND_YN) AS EXTRN_LEC_RSLT_REPT_SEND_YN, SCHM.SCH_DESC, INFO.USER_NM, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(SCHD.YEAR,SCHD.MONTH,SCHD.DAY),'%Y%m%d'),'%Y.%m.%d') AS START_DAY, CONCAT(SCHD.START_TM ,'-',SCHD.END_TM) AS START_TM FROM tb_tch_insd_tch_sch SCHM, tb_tch_insd_tch_sch_detl SCHD, tb_usr_user_info INFO WHERE SCHM.USER_NO = SCHD.USER_NO AND SCHM.USER_NO = INFO.USER_NO AND SCHM.SCH_SN = SCHD.SCH_SN AND SCHD.YEAR = #{searchYear} AND SCHD.MONTH =#{searchMonth} ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(SCHD.YEAR,SCHD.MONTH,SCHD.DAY),'%Y%m%d'),'%Y.%m.%d'), SCHD.START_TM,SCHD.END_TM

SELECT SCHM.USER_NO, SCHM.SCH_SN,SCHM.SCH_DIV_CD , FN_GET_CODE_NAME('SCH_DIV_CD',SCHM.SCH_DIV_CD) AS SCH_DIV_CDNM, SCHM.LEC_DIV_CD, FN_GET_CODE_NAME('LEC_DIV_CD',SCHM.LEC_DIV_CD) AS LEC_DIV_CDNM, SCHM.SCH_PURP_DIV_CD, FN_GET_CODE_NAME('SCH_PURP_DIV_CD',SCHM.SCH_PURP_DIV_CD) AS SCH_PURP_DIV_CDNM, SCHM.OTSD_LEC_GOING_DTTM, SCHM.OTSD_LEC_RETURN_DTTM, CONCAT(SUBSTR(SCHM.OTSD_LEC_GOING_DTTM,1,4),'.',SUBSTR(SCHM.OTSD_LEC_GOING_DTTM,5,2),'.',SUBSTR(SCHM.OTSD_LEC_GOING_DTTM,7,2)) AS OTSD_LEC_GOING_DTTM_DAY, SUBSTR(SCHM.OTSD_LEC_GOING_DTTM,9,2) AS OTSD_LEC_GOING_DTTM_HOUR, SUBSTR(SCHM.OTSD_LEC_GOING_DTTM,11,2) AS OTSD_LEC_GOING_DTTM_MINUTE, CONCAT(SUBSTR(SCHM.OTSD_LEC_RETURN_DTTM,1,4),'.',SUBSTR(SCHM.OTSD_LEC_RETURN_DTTM,5,2),'.',SUBSTR(SCHM.OTSD_LEC_RETURN_DTTM,7,2)) AS OTSD_LEC_RETURN_DTTM_DAY, SUBSTR(SCHM.OTSD_LEC_RETURN_DTTM,9,2) AS OTSD_LEC_RETURN_DTTM_HOUR, SUBSTR(SCHM.OTSD_LEC_RETURN_DTTM,11,2) AS OTSD_LEC_RETURN_DTTM_MINUTE, SCHM.REQ_ORG_NM, SCHM.PLACE,SCHM.TRAINING_CRS, SCHM.EDU_TARGET, SCHM.LEC_TITLE, SCHM.EDU_NOP_CNT, SCHM.ORG_CHRG_PRSN_PHONENO, SCHM.OFFICIAL_DOC_RECV_YN, FN_GET_CODE_NAME('OFFICIAL_DOC_RECV_YN',SCHM.OFFICIAL_DOC_RECV_YN) AS OFFICIAL_DOC_RECV_YNNM, SCHM.OTSD_LEC_REPT_RELEV_YN, FN_GET_CODE_NAME('LEC_REPT_RELEV_YN',SCHM.OTSD_LEC_REPT_RELEV_YN) AS OTSD_LEC_REPT_RELEV_YNNM, SCHM.OTSD_LEC_REPT_DATA_SEND_YN, FN_GET_CODE_NAME('DATA_SEND_YN',SCHM.OTSD_LEC_REPT_DATA_SEND_YN) AS OTSD_LEC_REPT_DATA_SEND_YNNM, SCHM.APPROVAL_YN, FN_GET_CODE_NAME('APPROVAL_YN',SCHM.APPROVAL_YN) AS APPROVAL_YNNM, SCHM.EXTRN_LEC_RSLT_REPT_SEND_YN, FN_GET_CODE_NAME('DATA_SEND_YN',SCHM.EXTRN_LEC_RSLT_REPT_SEND_YN) AS EXTRN_LEC_RSLT_REPT_SEND_YNNM, SCHM.SCH_DESC,SCHM.REG_NO,SCHM.REG_DTTM,SCHM.MOD_NO, SCHM.MOD_DTTM, SCHD.SCH_DETL_SN, SCHD.YEAR, SCHD.MONTH, SCHD.DAY, CONCAT(SCHD.YEAR,'.',SCHD.MONTH,'.',SCHD.DAY) AS START_DAY, SCHD.START_TM, SCHD.END_TM, SUBSTR(SCHD.START_TM,1,2) AS START_HOUR, SUBSTR(SCHD.START_TM,3,4) AS START_MINUTE, SUBSTR(SCHD.END_TM,1,2) AS END_HOUR, SUBSTR(SCHD.END_TM,3,4) AS END_MINUTE, INFO.USER_NM,ECL_DECRPART(INFO.MOBILE_NO,4) as MOBILE_NO,INFO.EMAIL, LOGI.USER_ID, (SELECT (CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) CNT FROM tb_tch_insd_tch_sch_detl B WHERE SCHM.SCH_SN = B.SCH_SN) DEL_YN FROM tb_tch_insd_tch_sch SCHM, tb_tch_insd_tch_sch_detl SCHD, tb_usr_user_info INFO, tb_usr_login LOGI WHERE SCHM.USER_NO = SCHD.USER_NO AND SCHM.USER_NO = INFO.USER_NO AND SCHM.USER_NO = LOGI.USER_NO AND SCHM.SCH_SN = SCHD.SCH_SN AND SCHD.SCH_SN = #{searchSchSn} AND SCHD.SCH_DETL_SN = #{searchSchDtlSn}

SELECT CONCAT((CASE WHEN SCHM.SCH_DIV_CD = 'O' THEN '외부' ELSE '내부' END),'-',INFO.USER_NM) AS TITLE, STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(SCHD.YEAR,SCHD.MONTH,SCHD.DAY),'%Y%m%d') as START_DATE, STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(SCHD.YEAR,SCHD.MONTH,SCHD.DAY),'%Y%m%d') AS END_DATE, CONCAT(SCHM.SCH_SN,'-',SCHD.SCH_DETL_SN) AS SCH_ID ,SCHD.YEAR,SCHD.MONTH, SCHD.DAY, SUBSTR(SCHD.START_TM,1,2) AS START_HH_TIME, SUBSTR(SCHD.START_TM,3,4) AS START_MM_TIME, SUBSTR(SCHD.END_TM,1,2) AS END_HH_TIME, SUBSTR(SCHD.END_TM,3,4) AS END_MM_TIME, SCHD.START_TM,SCHD.END_TM, SCHM.SCH_SN,SCHD.SCH_DETL_SN, INFO.EMAIL FROM tb_tch_insd_tch_sch SCHM, tb_tch_insd_tch_sch_detl SCHD, tb_usr_user_info INFO, tb_usr_login LOGI WHERE SCHM.USER_NO = SCHD.USER_NO AND SCHM.USER_NO = INFO.USER_NO AND SCHM.USER_NO = LOGI.USER_NO AND SCHM.SCH_SN = SCHD.SCH_SN AND SCHD.YEAR = #{searchYear} AND SCHD.MONTH =#{searchMonth} AND SCHM.USER_NO =#{searchNo}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM tb_tch_insd_tch_sch_detl WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND SCH_SN = #{schSn}
AND SCH_DETL_SN = #{schDetlSn}
DELETE FROM tb_tch_insd_tch_sch WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND SCH_SN = #{schSn}
